items.name: Perandus Signet
explicitMods: +29 to maximum Mana
46% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
2% increased Experience gain
2% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item Equipped
3% chance for Slain monsters to drop an additional Scroll of Wisdom
flavourText: "Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

items.name: The Jinxed Juju
explicitMods: +35 to Intelligence
+27% to Chaos Resistance
10% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
10% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Spectres' Life before you
flavourText: Burned rhoa's eye and goatman's beard do demand:
Dance, ye dead, at my command!

items.name: Rift Stinger
explicitMods: Adds 38 to 76 Fire Damage
Adds 75 to 131 Cold Damage
Adds 5 to 80 Lightning Damage
+24% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+9% to Cold Resistance
Gain 10 Life per Enemy Killed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Must support both an attack skill and a spell skill to work. The attack skill will trigger a spell when it critically strikes an enemy. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 11% less Spell Damage
Supported Attacks will Trigger a Supported Spell when you Crit an Enemy
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: The Supreme Truth
explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Gems
60% increased Intelligence Requirement
85% increased Physical Damage
18% increased Attack Speed
3% increased Experience gain
20% increased Elemental Damage
flavourText: Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 67 or lower
Supported Skills deal 33% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 2621 total Damage from Hits

+59 to maximum Mana

socketedItems.name: Foul Prism
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 36 Lightning Damage to Attacks
10% increased Damage over Time while wielding a Two Handed Weapon
6% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.typeLine: Ebullient Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods: 48% reduced Amount Recovered
135% increased Recovery rate
50% of Recovery applied Instantly

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 6 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 6 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

25% increased effect
36% chance to Avoid being Ignited during Effect

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
10% increased Attack Speed
+69 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
